Package com.radiotelescope.contracts.role

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserRoleFactory
    Abstract factory wrapper for all class UserRole CRUD operations. Each factory interface needs to have a method for each command object for its respective entity
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseUserRoleFactory
    Base concrete implementation interface UserRoleFactory interface
    RequestRole
    Override of the interface Command interface for a user to request new user role
    Retrieve
    Implementation of the interface Command interface used to retrieve a specific user role for an admin to then approve
    UnapprovedList
    Implementation of the interface Command interface used to find class UserRole objects that need an admin's approval
    UserRoleInfo
    Data class representing a read-only model of the class UserRole Entity, with some additionally class UserInfo information for the admin viewing it on the client-side
    UserUserRoleWrapper
    Wrapper responsible for adding user role validations for endpoints for the UserRole Entity
    Validate
    Implementation of the interface Command interface used to approve a class UserRole. The command works by letting the admin select the desired role and the associated class UserRole object will be updated to have this role and with then be set to approved
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ErrorTag
    Enum representing field validation errors
